com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations

Class BaseMarkerOptions<U extends Marker,T extends BaseMarkerOptions<U,T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.BaseMarkerOptions<U,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - Type of the marker to be composed
    T - Type of the builder to be used for composing a custom Marker
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MarkerOptions

    public abstract class BaseMarkerOptions<U extends Marker,T extends BaseMarkerOptions<U,T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Abstract builder class for composing custom Marker objects.

    Extending this class requires implementing Parceable interface.
